channel.title: How do i make a npc say this
channel.description:
KK for example i put a npc in home then how do i make it so the npc keep saying "Welcome to Project Gold, Enjoy"
(I don't mean he should say that when you talk to him i mean he should keep like saying it so everybody could see)

item.title: How do i make a npc say this
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

why isn’t it working for me? I’m using a 317

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say this

item.title: How do i make a npc say this
item.dc:creator: @dharok1337 dharok1337
item.description:
@dharok1337 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:8, topic:323010”][quote author=dharok1337 link=topic=419423.msg3082223#msg3082223 date=1262233876]

His code is right I believe.

[code]
if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to ProjectGold, Enjoy!”;
}
}

[code]

Are you sure you have the NPC already spawned?[/code][/code]

Replace the NPCIDHERE with the NPC ID.
[/quote]

I think everyone knows that.[/quote]

Agh, yea. I mis read a post and thought it said “Here’s my code right here”

DOH!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say this

[/quote]

item.title: How do i make a npc say this
item.dc:creator: @xlogga123 xlogga123
item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:2, topic:323010”]Go to NPCHandler.java, and just add it as an if statement.

For example:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 244) { if (misc.random(30) == 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Some Awesome Gear Here"; } }

Just make sure the NPC ID’s match.[/quote]
ehm well that didnt work :L

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say this

item.title: How do i make a npc say this
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Go to NPCHandler.java, and just add it as an if statement.

For example:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 244) { if (misc.random(30) == 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Some Awesome Gear Here"; } }

Just make sure the NPC ID’s match.

Read full topic
